
## use_oauth_token

* Sets up the OAuth credentials for a twitteR session from an existing Token object 

* This function uses an existing httr OAuth Token in the Twitter session 


#### Usage
<pre><code>
use_oauth_token(twitter_token)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments
* twitter_token An httr Token object

#### Details
* This function is an escape hatch for nonstandard OAuth scenarios. 
* Use setup_twitter_token unless it doesn't work for your use case. 

####  Value

This is called for its side effect
